name: Mounted Skirmisher

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Ride rank 14, Mounted Combat, Trick Riding.

sections.body: If your mount moves its speed or less, you can still take a full-attack action.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: If your mount moves more than 5 feet, you can only take an attack action.
sections.name: Normal

description: You are adept at attacking from upon a swift moving steed.
